trait.name: Divine Smite
entries: When Bernlack hits with a melee weapon attack, they can expend one spell slot to deal 9 ({@damage 2d8}) extra radiant damage to the target plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) for each spell level higher than 1st and and additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) against undead or fiends.

trait.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: Bernlack can reroll a 1 or 2 once on a damage die for an attack made two hands.

trait.name: Divine Health
entries: Bernlack is immune to disease.

trait.name: Slasher
entries: When Bernlack scores a critical hit that deals slashing damage to a creature, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

trait.name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
entries: Whenever Bernlack regains hit points while within 100 feet of their familiar, any dice rolled to regain hit points is treated as having rolled their maximum value.

trait.name: Voice of the Chain Master
entries: Bernlack can communicate telepathically with his familiar, perceive through its senses, and speak through it in his own voice.

trait.name: Stone of Good Luck
entries: Bernlack has a {@b +1} bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bernlack is a 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Bernlack has the following warlock and paladin spells prepared:
footerEntries: Bernlack regains up to two 2nd level spell slots on a Short Rest.

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Bernlack's ritual spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Bernlack makes two attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. The target's speed is reduced by 10ft. until the start of Bernlack's next turn.

action.name: Channel Divinity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Nature's Wrath}
items.entry: Bernlack causes vines to erupt and force a creature within 10 feet to make a {@dc 14} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (their choice) or becomes {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. The restrained creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: {@b Turn the Faithless}
items.entry: Each fey and fiend within 30 feet of Bernlack must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from Bernlack as it can, can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of Bernlack, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there's nowhere to move.

action.name: Fey Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack causes each creature in a 10-foot cube to make a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Lay on Hands Pool (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Bernlack has a pool of healing power that can restore {@b 25} HP. Bernlack can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

action.name: Divine Sense (6/Long Rest)
entries: Until the end of Bernlack's next turn, they can sense anything affected by the hallow spell or know the location of any celestial, fiend, undead within 60 ft. that is not behind total cover.

reaction.name: Guardian Emblem (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Bernlack suffers a critical hit they can turn the critical hit into a normal hit instead.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the {@condition poisoned} target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: Dixie touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw, Dixie also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: Dixie magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Dixie wears or carries is invisible with it.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Elaine deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Elaine doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Elaine is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Elaine instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Actor
entries: Elaine has advantage on Charisma ({@skill Deception}) and Charisma ({@skill Performance}) checks made to hide his identity.

trait.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
entries: When Elaine casts {@spell mage hand}, they can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}. They can also perform the following additional tasks unnoticed by succeeding on a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check contested by a creature's Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check:

items: Stow one object the hand is holding in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Retrieve an object in a container worn or carried by another creature.
Use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Elaine is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The Elaine has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Rapier, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Change Appearance
entries: Elaine can change their appearance and voice. They determine the specifics of the changes and can adjust their height and weight, but must remain medium sized.
They stay in this new form until they uses an action to revert to their true form or until they die.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Elaine can take the following actions: Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Controls their {@spell mage hand}.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Elaine can halve the damage from an attack against them if they can see the attacker.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When Gil is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a DEX saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Gil deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Gil can take the following as actions: Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

bonus.name: Master of Tactics
entries: Gil can use the Help action. When using the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, the target of that attack can be within 30

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When Gil is hit by an attack when he can see the attacker, he can halve the attack's damage against.

trait.name: Keen Mind
entries: Hana always knows which way is north, how many hours left before the next sunrise or sunset, and can accurately recall anything they have seen or heard within the past month.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hana is an 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Hana has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Minor Conjuration
entries: Hana conjures an inanimate object smaller than 3 feet on a side that weighs less than 10 pounds. The object radiates dim light out to 5 feet and disappears after 1 hour, when they use this feature again, or if it takes any damage.

bonus.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher is cast)
entries: Hana teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

trait.name: Manifest Mind - Cast Spell (3/Long Rest)
entries: When casting a wizard spell, Parry can cast it from the spectral tome's space.

trait.name: Manifest Mind - One with the Word
entries: The Parry has advantage on all Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks.

trait.name: Arcane Recovery (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When finishing a short rest, the Parry can recover expended spell slots - up to a combined level of {@b 4}, and none of the slots can be 6th level or higher.

trait.name: Awakened Spellbook
entries: When casting a spell, Parry can replace its damage type with the damage type done by another spell of the same level.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Parry rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, they can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Parry has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Parry can move through the space of any creature that is medium or larger.

trait.name: Stout Resilience
entries: Parry has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Parry is a 8th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability for wizard spells is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The Parry has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Ritual Casting
headerEntries: Parry's ritual spellcasting ability for wizard spells is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The spells can be cast at will, taking 10 minutes longer to cast than normal:

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Manifest Mind (Recharges after a Long Rest; or a Spell Slot is spent to use it)
entries: A Tiny spectral tome hovers in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Parry. It sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius and disappears if it is 300 feet away from them. While manifested, the tome can hear and see, has 60 ft. of darkvision and can telepathically share with Parry what it sees and hears (no action required).
As a bonus action, the tome to hover up to 30 feet. It can pass through creatures but not objects.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny construct. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Skeletonize
entries: If the swarm starts its turn in the same space as a dead creature that is Huge or smaller, the corpse is destroyed, leaving behind only equipment and bones (or exoskeleton).

trait.name: Scale Dust
entries: The swarm releases magical glittering dust from its wings. Each creature that moves within the swarm's space is covered in is dust and becomes outlined in blue light. While outlined in this way, a creature sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius, has disadvantage of stealth checks, can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}, and attacks targeting the creature are made at advantage. Using an action to remove the dust on the creature ends the effect on it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes a ravenous bite attacks in all creatures in its space

action.name: Ravenous Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}24 ({@damage 6d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. If the target is a creature, scarabs burrow into its body, and the creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. Any creature can use an action to kill or remove the scarabs with fire or a weapon that deals piercing damage, causing 1 damage of the appropriate type to the target. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the swarm's piercing damage dies. A creature damaged by the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease.
At the start of the diseased creature, roll a d6 to determine the disease's effect:

items.name: {@b 1-2}
items.entry: The creature's walking speed decreases by 10ft. Any additional movement speeds the creature has are halved.

items.name: {@b 3-4}
items.entry: The creature takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage each turn and it's hit point maximum decreases by that value. The reduction lasts until the disease ends.

items.name: {@b 5-6}
items.entry: The creature has a -2 penalty to ability checks and attack rolls.

entries: The disease lasts until the scarabs are removed from the creature.
